titleStmt.title: Istanbul, Topkapı Palace Museum (Topkapı Sarayı Müzesi), E. H. 28 [= Karatay 35]

respStmt.resp: Edited by Michael Marx in collaboration with Tobias J. Jocham et. al. TEI version created by Yasmin Faghihi and Huw Jones

msIdentifier.repository: Topkapı Palace Museum (Topkapı Sarayı Müzesi) , Istanbul

summary.p: 14 fol.; Writing surface: parchment; Shelfmark: E. H. 28; Text: Q 50:3-27, Q 4:140-142, Q 47:37-Q 48:28; 6 lines per page; Dimensions: 275 x 185 mm; Script style: kūfī; Estimated date of production: 2nd (8th) to 3rd (9th) centuries [according to Karatay].

This entry is based on the catalogue of Fehmi E. Karatay (1888-1968). Currently we do not have access to the images. With exceptions, the catalogue does not contain precise information on the distribution of the text throughout the pages. For this reason, only fol. 1 is given.

Karatay (1962) describes the manuscripts as follows, pp. 13-14: "35 E. H. 28 Kur’an’dan parçalar Parşömen. 185mm boy ve 275mm eninde cönk biçiminde 14 yaprak. Sahifede II-III. (VIII-IX) asır kûfîsiyle 6 satır. Sonunda geçmelerle müzeyyen yaldızlı bir levha vardır. Vişneçürüğü deri cilt. Y. 1b de Ḳāf (50) suresinin 2. [3.] ayeti اذا متنا وكنا ترابا (ء) ibaresinden başlıyarak Y. 6b de aynı surenin 28. [27.] ayetinin başındaki قال قر(ينه) kelimesiyle biter; Y. 7a de Nisāʾ (4) suresinin 140. ayetinin sonlarında başlar ve 142. ayetin sonunda biter; Y. 8a Muḥammad (47) suresinin 37. ayeti ile başlıyor; Y. 8b da Fatḥ (48) suresinin yalnız başlığı vardır; Y. 9a da ise bu surenin 23. ayetine geçiyor ve Y. 12b nin sonunda 28. ayetle bitiyor ve Y. 13a tekrar baş tarafına avdetle aynı surenin 16. ayetinden başlıyarak 17. ayetin ولا على الاعرج حرج ولا ibaresiyle bitiyor."

This can be translated as follows: "35 E. H. 28 Fragments of the Qurʾān Parchment. 14 junk shaped leaves of 185 mm height and 275 mm width. The text area written in Kufic script of 2nd-3rd(8th-9th) centuries [contains] 6 lines. There is a gilded border with interlaced illuminations at the end. Cherry brown leather binding. L. 1b begins with the words اذا متنا وكنا ترابا (ء) of Q 50:3 (Sūra Qāf), and [the sūra] ends with words قال قر(ينه) of verse 28 of the same sūra on the beginning of [the leaf] L. 6b. L. 7a begins towards the end of Q 4:140 (Sūra al-Nisāʾ) and ends with the verse 142. L. 8a begins with Q 47:37 (Sūra Muḥammad). L. 8b contains only the heading of Q 48 (Sūra al-Fatḥ). On L. 9a it goes to the 23rd verse of this sūra and ends at the end of L. 12b with verse 28. L. 13a goes back to the beginning, starting with verse 16 of the same sūra and ending with the words ولا على الاعرج حرج ولا of verse 17."
